text: Hoppers is an upcoming Pixar movie set for March 6, 2026. Written and directed by Daniel Chong, the film stars the voices of Piper Curda, Bobby Moynihan, and Jon Hamm. == story == A young girl named Mabel being placed into the mind of a robotic beaver. == cast == * Piper Curda as MabelHoppers D23 First Look * Bobby Moynihan as King George, a beaver * Jon Hamm as Mayor Jerry, a greedy mayor == release == The film will be released in theatres in the United States by Disney on March 6, 2026. == References ==
title: Hoppers (film)
